description: This file defines the UI screen for displaying a list of notes in a Flutter app, including features like search, layout toggle between grid and list, sorting options, context menu actions for notes, and navigation to note editing and settings screens.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of notes with search, layout toggle, and sorting options.

classes.name: _NotesListScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and interactions of NotesListScreen, including search visibility, layout mode, and context menu handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the notes list screen, including app bar, search bar, list or grid of notes, and floating action button.

methods.name: _showContextMenu
methods.description: Displays a bottom sheet menu for a specific note with options to pin/unpin or delete.
